com.jobboard.aggregator.mapper

Interface JobApplicationMapper


  • @Mapper
public interface JobApplicationMapper
    Mybatis mapper interface. The methods in this interface are responsible to interact with the Data base and execute corresponding SQL query to fetch/add data to Data Base

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long addNewApplication(JobApplication jobApplication)
      Inserts new Job application to the Database.
      void deleteJobApplicationWithId(long id)
      Deletes a job application permanently from the database
      ArrayList<JobApplication> fetchAllApplicationByUnivByCompanyInDateRange(String univId, String company, Date startDate, Date endDate)
      Fetches job applications made from a university to a specific company during specified date range
      ArrayList<JobApplication> fetchAllApplicationByUnivInDateRange(String univId, Date startTime, Date endTime)
      Fetches all the job applications made from a university during specified date range.
      ArrayList<JobApplication> fetchJobApplications(long startId, long numberOfRecords, long userId, long univId)
      Fetches a specified number of maximum records for a user beginning from a specified Job Id

    • Method Detail

      • fetchAllApplicationByUnivInDateRange

        @Select(value="select * from job_applications_table where univ_id = #{univId} and applied_time >= #{startTime} and applied_time <= #{endTime}")
 @Result(property="userId",column="user_id") @Result(property="univId",column="univ_id") @Result(property="jobId",column="job_id") @Result(property="appliedTime",column="applied_time") @Result(property="assessmentTime",column="assessment_time") @Result(property="interviewTime",column="interview_time") @Result(property="responseTime",column="response_time")
ArrayList<JobApplication> fetchAllApplicationByUnivInDateRange(String univId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Date startTime,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Date endTime)
        Fetches all the job applications made from a university during specified date range.
        Parameters:
        univId - The unique ID assigned to the university by the authenticator
        startTime - The beginning of the date range
        endTime - The end of the date range
        Returns:
        The list of fetched applications

      • fetchAllApplicationByUnivByCompanyInDateRange

        @Select(value="select * from job_applications_table where univ_id = #{univId} and company = #{company} and applied_time >= #{startDate} and applied_time <= #{endDate}")
 @Result(property="userId",column="user_id") @Result(property="univId",column="univ_id") @Result(property="jobId",column="job_id") @Result(property="appliedTime",column="applied_time") @Result(property="assessmentTime",column="assessment_time") @Result(property="interviewTime",column="interview_time") @Result(property="responseTime",column="response_time")
ArrayList<JobApplication> fetchAllApplicationByUnivByCompanyInDateRange(String univId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          String company,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Date startDate,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Date endDate)
        Fetches job applications made from a university to a specific company during specified date range
        Parameters:
        univId - The unique ID assigned to the university by the authenticator
        company - The name of the company
        startDate - The beginning of the date range
        endDate - The end of the date range
        Returns:

      • findApplicationById

        @Select(value="select * from job_applications_table where id = #{id}")
 @Result(property="userId",column="user_id") @Result(property="univId",column="univ_id") @Result(property="jobId",column="job_id") @Result(property="appliedTime",column="applied_time") @Result(property="assessmentTime",column="assessment_time") @Result(property="interviewTime",column="interview_time") @Result(property="responseTime",column="response_time")
JobApplication findApplicationById(long id)
        Fetches job application by it's unique id
        Parameters:
        id - The unique id of the job application
        Returns:
        returns the job application with the give id

      • fetchJobApplications

        @Select(value="select * from job_applications_table where id >= #{startId} and user_id = #{userId} and univ_id = #{univId} order by id limit #{numberOfRecords}")
 @Result(property="userId",column="user_id") @Result(property="univId",column="univ_id") @Result(property="jobId",column="job_id") @Result(property="appliedTime",column="applied_time") @Result(property="assessmentTime",column="assessment_time") @Result(property="interviewTime",column="interview_time") @Result(property="responseTime",column="response_time")
ArrayList<JobApplication> fetchJobApplications(long startId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          long numberOfRecords,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          long userId,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          long univId)
        Fetches a specified number of maximum records for a user beginning from a specified Job Id
        Parameters:
        startId - The beginning id of the job applications to be fetched
        numberOfRecords - The maximum number of job applications to be fetched
        userId - The unique id assigned to the user.
        univId - The unique Id of the university/school
        Returns:
        returns a list of job applications satisfying all the conditions.

      • fetchJobApplicationsCount

        @Select(value="select count(*) from job_applications_table where user_id = #{userId} and univ_id = #{univId}")
Long fetchJobApplicationsCount(long userId,
                                                                                                                                               long univId)
        Fetches the number of job applications made by a particular user
        Parameters:
        userId - The unique Id of the user.
        univId - The unique Id of the university/school
        Returns:
        returns the count of applications made by the user.

      • getBeginId

        @Select(value="select id from job_applications_table where user_id = #{userId} and univ_id = #{univId} order by id limit 1")
Long getBeginId(long userId,
                                                                                                                                              long univId)
        Fetches the id of the oldest job application made by a particular user
        Parameters:
        userId - The unique id of the user
        univId - The unique Id of the university/school
        Returns:
        returns the id of the oldest job application made by the user.

      • getEndId

        @Select(value="select id from job_applications_table where user_id = #{userId} and univ_id = #{univId} order by id DESC limit 1")
Long getEndId(long userId,
                                                                                                                                                 long univId)
        Fetches the id of the latest job application made by a particular user
        Parameters:
        userId - The unique id of the user
        univId - The unique Id of the university/school
        Returns:
        returns the id of the latest job application made by the user.

      • addNewApplication

        @Insert(value="insert into job_applications_table (user_id, univ_id, company, position, status, job_id, location, applied_time, assessment_time, interview_time, response_time) values (#{userId}, #{univId}, #{company}, #{position}, #{status}, #{jobId}, #{location}, #{appliedTime}, #{assessmentTime}, #{interviewTime}, #{responseTime})")
 @Options(useGeneratedKeys=true,
         keyProperty="id",
         keyColumn="id")
long addNewApplication(JobApplication jobApplication)
        Inserts new Job application to the Database.
        Parameters:
        jobApplication - The job application details to be added to the Database
        Returns:
        returns number of records added to database.

      • updateJobApplication

        @Update(value="update job_applications_table set company = #{company}, position = #{position}, job_id = #{jobId}, status = #{status},  location = #{location}, applied_time = #{appliedTime}, assessment_time = #{assessmentTime}, interview_time = #{interviewTime}, response_time = #{responseTime} where id = #{id}")
long updateJobApplication(JobApplication jobApplication)
        Updates an existing job application with the new fields
        Parameters:
        jobApplication - The updated field values of the job application
        Returns:
        returns number of database rows updated.

      • deleteJobApplicationWithId

        @Delete(value="delete from job_applications_table where id = #{id}")
void deleteJobApplicationWithId(long id)
        Deletes a job application permanently from the database
        Parameters:
        id - The unique Id of the job application to be delete from the database.
